column2: Attracts nearby projectiles to this one and makes them dangerous to everyone

Casts 10 copies of the next spell
Your projectiles try to home towards enemies, but only horizontally.
Your projectiles try to home towards enemies, but only vertically.
A circle that repeatedly casts a spell
Any material conversions on a projectile are reversed
Gives a projectile a trail of toxic sludge
Gives a projectile an inebriating trail
Gives a projectile a trail of flummoxium
Gives a projectile a trail of pheromone
Gives a projectile a trail of sand

Increases the amount of material in a projectiles trail
A sparkbolt with both a trigger and a timer, which have seperate payloads
A sparkbolt with two triggers, which have seperate payloads
Remember a shot state for later (voided on end of cast)
Wraps your wand, but doesn't reorder it
Makes a projectile shorter lived but more firey

Casts the next spell in the wand

A strange bubble that seems to form polygons on its own
